properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 12:14PM CST until February 29 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Thursday February 13 until Friday February 28.
* At 12 PM Wednesday the stage was 36.2 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 41.0 feet on Wednesday February 19.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday February 13 and
continue to rise to near 41.0 feet by Wednesday February 19.The
river will fall below flood stage by Friday February 28.
* At 42.0 feet...In Tennessee, Pea Ridge Road is flooding. Lane to
homestead northwest of Pea Ridge Road just by the river is
flooding. Water begins to go over the Tennemo Levee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
